title: Add a playful baby-themed comedy animation on the Login page

requirements.text: Add a playful, comedic baby-themed animated sequence to the Login page that visually conveys “baby laughter” plus motion beats like moving/running and kissing (e.g., hearts), while keeping the existing login form fully functional and readable.

quotes: now i want on login page best comedy full baby laughter moving running kissing to user animination i want

acceptanceCriteria: The Login page shows a clearly visible baby-themed animation section on initial load.
The animation includes distinct, readable visual beats that suggest: laughter, moving/running, and kissing/hearts.
The login form (email/password, submit, errors) works exactly as before and remains the primary actionable UI.
The animation does not block typing/clicking on any inputs or buttons and does not cause layout shift that hides the form.

requirements.text: Implement the Login page baby-themed animation using Framer Motion with consistent 0.5s transition timing for entrance and key motion beats, and ensure it is responsive (works on mobile and desktop without overflowing the login card/container).

quotes: now i want on login page best comedy full baby laughter moving running kissing to user animination i want

acceptanceCriteria: Framer Motion is used for the new Login page animation elements (not only CSS keyframes).
Entrance and interaction/motion transitions used for the new sequence are consistent with 0.5s duration (matching the app’s animation standard).
On small screens, the animation scales/reflows so the login form remains fully visible without horizontal scrolling.

requirements.text: Add generated static visual assets (illustrations/overlays) required for the baby-themed animation under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them directly from the frontend (no backend routing).

quotes: now i want on login page best comedy full baby laughter moving running kissing to user animination i want

acceptanceCriteria: All new images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The Login page references these assets via static paths and the animation renders correctly in production builds.
No backend or remote image hosting is introduced for these assets.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only and must be composed).
Do not change authentication rules or the exact blocked-login message behavior already implemented on the Login page.
Keep the existing dark luxury/glassmorphism visual system consistent with the rest of the app.
nonGoals: Adding real audio playback (e.g., laughter sound) or microphone features.
Changing backend behavior (the backend is currently unused for auth).
Adding third-party animation services/integrations (e.g., Lottie web services).

required: Cute cartoon baby character illustration, front-facing, smiling/laughing, transparent background (baby-laugh.dim_512x512.png)
Small heart/kiss overlay icons set, transparent background (kiss-hearts.dim_256x256.png)
Small motion streaks/dust puffs for running effect, transparent background (run-streaks.dim_256x256.png)

preferencesToAdd: Wants a comedic baby-themed animation on the Login page (laughter, moving/running, kissing).
